text: Allakh khotel razoblachit' litsemerov, kotorym bylo skazano, kogda oni otvratilis' ot srazheniya v den' "Ukhud": "Idite, srazhaytes' na puti Allakha ili zashchishchayte sebya". No oni otvetili, otkazyvayas' i opravdyvayas': "Yesli by my znali, chto v etot den' budet srazheniye, my posledovali by za vami". Skazav eto, oni blizhe k neveriyu, chem k vere Allakha. Oni svoimi ustami govorili, chto net nikakogo srazheniya, khotya v svoikh serdtsakh byli uvereny, chto budet srazheniye.
